title: Upgrade Bots

I dont see why not, it would be good practice for people not keen on going right into other players. They would actually have to make a jungler bot though, that actually contests drag and herald etc.... I doubt that would happen.

I have a lot of friends that play league but hate pvp. This would be a big change for them to play if it actually happened.

Sure, I will not say no to QOL improvements to the bots, especially if they increase the variety. If Blizzard can figure out how to have five ai difficulties, and a bot for every new hero on release in Heroes of the Storm, I don't see why Riot, with a more popular and better staffed game (and I assume more profitable) cannot do the same.

Something better, I think, would be to allow user created bots.

We'd have something like the current Riot-API but for things going on in a League game. Users could build their own bots (if enemyChampion.HP <= executeAmount, use Pyke R).

We could have small bot tournaments as well as the best bots facing off against human players.

Frankly, I'm almost surprised Riot hasn't removed co-op modes yet. Play rates are very low, they're absolutely infested with leveling scripts, long-standing bugs go ignored, some of the newer bot champs have been so broken they had to be removed... It's pretty sad. A little PvE is nice sometimes, but it's a pipe dream in LoL.
